entries.description: Install-time token issued to capture user consent, including TTL and revoke behavior.
Token that represents a user without storing direct identifiers.
Token tied to a known identity with explicit consent.
Role responsible for approving policy and cache rule changes.

Explicit rules for event capture limits, sampling, and rate enforcement.
